column6: Earth is on a collision course with oblivion...and Magneto's just learned time is running out. With everything he's fought for being brought to an unescapable end, how will the Master of Magnetism spend his LAST DAYS on Earth? Will Magneto celebrate his legacy...or be tortured by it?
column8: | writer:Cullen Bunn | artist:Paul Davidson | penciller (cover):David Yardin
